text: 5.2: Kis 29.18; Wkp 1.9; Sng 40.6; Zo 13.34; Ro 14.15; 2 Ko 2.15; Ga 2.20; Hi 7.27; 10.10; 1 Zo 3.11; 3.23Nde guigira wari won ndavir harigi ntɨɨri ga ndɨɨi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨp, wari ruri. Krais, ana guigira won ndavara nza nɨɨŋgiap won tuma fekhɨngiap nzan kurigi. Nde mba tɨva zɨn ŋgɨri. Ana won tuma fekhɨngiap Fhe Bakɨme nzuav ndɨgar vhuuŋ hi ofa mbui fara muuŋgi ofa muuŋgi.
